mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team(stadiumId, teamName, createDate) VALUES(#{stadiumId}, #{teamName}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, (SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM team WHERE teamName < t.teamName) AS no, s.stadiumName, t.teamName, t.createDate FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id ORDER BY no
SELECT t.id, s.stadiumName, t.teamName, t.createDate FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET stadiumId = #{stadiumId}, teamName = #{teamName} WHERE id = #{id}
